== Main Inclusion Report for gmetadom ==

=== Requirements ===
# Availability: http://archive.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/pool/universe/g/gmetadom, Arch: any
# Rationale: new required build-depedency of `gtkmathview` and `gdome2` which is needed for `abiword` and is already in main.
# Security: No security isses reported
# Quality assurance:
** Maintained quite well in Debian:  http://packages.qa.debian.org/g/gmetadom.html - updated quite regularly
** Just one open Debian bug:
** ''importang'' bug, (libstdc++ allocator change), which will be adressed soon - <nowiki>[[http://bugs.debian.org/cgi-bin/bugreport.cgi?bug=339174|339174]]</nowiki>
 0. Standards compliance:
** The package meets the FHS, Debian Policy.
 0. Dependencies:
** Build-Depends on 
** main stuff (`debhelper (>> 4.0.0), ocaml-nox (>= 3.08), pkg-config, g++-3.4`)
** universe stuff (`ocaml-findlib, libgdome2-dev (>= 0.8.1)`) which has been adressed in Inclusion reports
